attributes.action: For the Prime Minster to resign or to call a general election.
attributes.additional_details: This current government resembles a parody of George Orwell’s 1984, being both authoritarian and arguably highly incompetent. Not only are they clamping down on the right to protest, they have routinely failed to act timely in response to new strains of Covid, costing lives and damaging the economy. This government is unfit for purpose and Boris Johnson must resign or call for a general election, allowing the people of the UK to decided his administration’s fate.
attributes.background: This petition is calling for the government to hold a general election or for the Prime Minister (The Rt Hon Boris Johnson) to resign post haste.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Hold a general election in December 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597916
